play.description: Make me play a song of YouTube.
play.nowPlaying: Yeah! I'm now playing `{{0}}`. Have a nice music!
play.argsNotFound: You need put a name song or a YouTube URL.
play.addedToQueue: Sure! I adding `{{0}}` to queue. Just wait a moment.

volume.description: Changes the volume of the player.
volume.successfully: Okay... Wait a moment, I'm changing the volume to `{{0}}`.
volume.minimalVol: Whoa sweet. The minimal volume is limited to `5`.
volume.maxVol: Stop right there! You'll stay deaf if I put more than `150`.
volume.argsNotFound: You need put a value, then so I will change the volume for you, sweet.

stop.stoped: Ok sweet. I'm leaving from the voice channel
